pkgmetadata.longdescription: Create the Tree of Science from WoS and Scopus // The goal of 'tosr' is to create the Tree of Science from Web of Science (WoS) and Scopus data. It can read files from both sources at the same time. More information can be found in Valencia- Hernndez (2020) https://revistas.unal.edu.co/index.php/ingeinv/ article/view/77718.
